name: Manus.ai

session.name: Get Session
session.description: Retrieve a Manus agent session with conversation context

list_sessions.name: List Sessions
list_sessions.description: List all Manus agent sessions for usage inventory

project_file.name: Project File Access
project_file.description: Access code files from Manus web development projects

user_credits.name: Available Credits
user_credits.description: User credit balance for usage tracking

_notes: Connect Protocol (gRPC-style JSON over HTTP, connect-protocol-version:1). Non-streaming JSON responses over HTTP. Real-time AI response streaming via Socket.IO WebSocket on /socket.io/ and /notifier-v2-socket-io/ — MUST be whitelisted separately (not covered by service path wildcards). Endpoints needing traces for parser rules: user.v1.UserService/GetAvailableCredits, user.v1.UserService/UserInfo, session.v1.SessionService/CreateMessage (user prompt submission), session.v1.SessionService/GetSessionEvents (conversation history). Socket.IO turn detection note: _is_ws_turn_complete() cannot parse Socket.IO framing (42[...] prefix is not valid JSON) — messages aggregate at connection close instead of per-turn.
